code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import pdf from"../pdf/Resume.pdf";import hero from"./data/hero.json";import Typed from"typed.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const typedRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const options={strings:["Welcome to my profile","My Name is Sahil Singh","I am a Web developer"],typeSpeed:40,backSpeed:40,loop:true};const typed=new Typed(typedRef.current,options);return()=>{typed.destroy();};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container home",id:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left","data-aos":"fade-up-right","data-aos-duration":"1000",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{ref:typedRef,"aria-label":"Dynamic heading"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:pdf,download:"Resume.pdf",className:"btn btn-outline-warning my-4",children:"Download Resume"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img","data-aos":"fade-up-left","data-aos-duration":"1000",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/assets/".concat(hero.imgSrc),alt:"hero"})})})]});};export default Home;
